Author: Crotchetylilkitten
Text: Easy low-cal read sauce:  Garlic cloves to taste (Chopped pretty fine and saut√©d with pan spray) Chicken broth 1/2-3/4 cup  (Get it hot in the pan after garlic) Tomato paste 2 TBSP (Stir it into hot chicken broth) Add spices.  (I use red pepper flakes, oregano, salt and pepper)  Throw your noodles in and let them cook in the sauce for 3 minutes covered!
